oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Cabinet card of Elliott H. Boyd
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Post-Civil War photograph of Elliott H. Boyd who served as a private in Co. G, 6th Tenn. Mtd. Inf. Regt., USA. Boyd enlisted in Pikeville, Tennessee on February 20, 1865 and listed his occupation as a farmer. The 6th Tenn. Mtd. Inf. Regt., USA served mainly in North Georgia against the guerrilla band under John P. Gatewood.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Boyd, Elliott H.
